document_data.caption: The beautiful and deadly Kadila adh Vitendi.
document_data.name: Kadila adh Vitendi
document_data.mainbody: dila was a Righteous Sister within the [[Order of the Sun Soul]], a monastic order originating in ancient [[Netheril]] who followed [[Amaunator]] and later [[Lathander]], [[Selûne]], and [[Sune]]. In addition to the [[Common]] tongue, Kadila spoke [[Draconic language|Draconic]], [[Ignan]], [[Alzhedo]], and [[Loross]].
document_data.Activities: Kadila was a Righteous Sister within the [[Order of the Sun Soul]], a monastic order originating in ancient [[Netheril]] who followed [[Amaunator]] and later [[Lathander]], [[Selûne]], and [[Sune]]. In addition to the [[Common]] tongue, Kadila spoke [[Draconic language|Draconic]], [[Ignan]], [[Alzhedo]], and [[Loross]].
document_data.History: Kadila was born in [[Teshburl]] in [[Calimshan]] as an illegitimate child of the sultan [[Mond el Vitendi]]. Raised in a harem as a [[Alzhedo dictionary#J|''jhasina'']], or harem slave, she was later sold by her father to a distant cousin in [[Memnon]]. The caravan she was traveling with was attacked by bandits ''en route'' to Memnon. Kadila fled during the confusion, working in [[tavern]]s and [[inn]]s during her travels and eventually settling in Waterdeep. She had a chance meeting with [[Hanor Kichavo]] and was immediately drawn to the ways of the Sun Soul monk.
document_data.Possessions: She wielded a [[silver]] [[light mace]] in combat. She owned several [[magic item]]s including a pair of ''[[bracers of armor]]'', an ''[[amulet of mighty fists]]'', ''[[gloves of dexterity]]'', and [[potion]]s of ''[[Potion of barkskin|barkskin]]'', ''[[Potion of cat's grace|cat's grace]]'', and ''[[potion of cure light wounds|cure light wounds]]''.
